short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to focus on the video you are watching and not the other stuff YouTube wants you to focus on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove everything from a YouTube video page except the video itself. Press the h key to toggle between focus mode and normal mode. This extension is open source and released under the MIT license, visit https://github.com/sujaldev/vistube
